publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-516# Cathy Peattie: Asthma Care in Scotland-That the Parliament welcomes the report Life at the Crossroads - the organisation of asthma care in Scotland, published by the National Asthma Campaign and considers that all NHS boards should move quickly to implement the SIGN guidelines.
S2M-516# Asthma Care in Scotland (lodged on 28 October 2003) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-516# Cathy Peattie: Asthma Care in Scotland-That the Parliament welcomes the report Life at the Crossroads - the organisation of asthma care in Scotland, published by the National Asthma Campaign and considers that all NHS boards should move quickly to implement the SIGN guidelines. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Rosie Kane*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-516# Asthma Care in Scotland (lodged on 28 October 2003) Robert Brown*
